hero.about: I've started studying web development in search of a profession that would keep me motivated and offer me a more stable future for my personal life. Today, I'm really glad I made that decision, because I enjoy the industry, I have fun working on each project, and I'm very motivated to keep learning and growing as a professional.

BoardGames-manager.title: Board Games Manager
BoardGames-manager.description: Desktop application for a board game company where users can create profiles and make different reservations or consult games. Includes authentication, game filtering, PDF reservation downloads, and ranking system.

Disney-Chatbots.title: Disney Chatbots
Disney-Chatbots.description: Web application that allows you to explore Disney universe characters and ask them (through predefined questions) information about them. Features character filtering, chat with predefined responses, and localStorage recovery.

Sistema-de-autenticacion-centralizado.title: Central Auth
Sistema-de-autenticacion-centralizado.description: Centralized Authentication System (IdP/SSO) developed for U-Tad university. Provides a single point of authentication and identity management for all institutional applications with JWT tokens, OAuth2/OIDC support, and RBAC.

MurciaH&R.title: MurciaH&R
MurciaH&R.description: Project that show hotels and restaurants in Murcia / Spain and you cant filter the information and navegate to the institution link

Mechanography-for-developers.title: Mechanography for Developers
Mechanography-for-developers.description: Personal web app for programming language typing practice. Interactive code editor for mechanography practice with speed and accuracy measurement, supporting any programming language.

Laberinto.title: Maze Creator
Laberinto.description: Java game using Swing where the player faces a maze with obstacles (crocodiles and first aid kits), and can only advance by correctly answering questions. Includes maze creation, question management, and ranking system.

Lovers-Web-App.title: Lovers Web App
Lovers-Web-App.description: Class project to collect user information for registration on a dating website. Provides a complete user registration flow with profile management and local data storage.
